description: '''El Consorcio''' is a Spanish singing group from [[Bilbao]], formed in 1993 by singers [[Amaya Uranga|Amaya]], [[Estíbaliz Uranga|Estíbaliz]] and Iñaki Uranga, Carlos Zubiaga and Sergio Blanco, all of them past members of the singing group [[Mocedades]]. In 2016 they received the [[Latin Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award]].
